channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 18:08 Fragrant anxiety in Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Since further messages.
item.description: 游릭 18:08 Fragrant anxiety in Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Since further messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
